ai.summary: Chapel Cliff Walk in Lansallos is a short, easy coastal trail along cliff tops near the village. At about 2.6 km, it offers sea views and a gentle route suitable for most walkers, with a mix of open coastal scenery and village surroundings.
ai.terrain_summary: The route follows a defined coastal path with exposed cliff edges. Expect compact dirt tracks with some uneven sections, small rocks, and gentle rises. The surface can be muddy after rain and may feel exposed in windy conditions.
ai.safety_notes: Coastal paths can be windy and slippery, especially near cliff edges. Stay on marked paths, supervise children and dogs, and avoid edges after rain. Check weather and sea conditions before starting. Bring a charged phone, a map or GPS, and basic first aid. Wear sturdy footwear and weather-appropriate clothing.
recommended_gear: Map or offline navigation ability (or phone with battery pack)
ai.best_seasons: All year round, with particularly pleasant conditions in late spring to early autumn (roughly March to October) when paths are drier and views are clearer.

seo.title: Chapel Cliff Walk, Lansallos – Easy 2.6 km Coastal Trail in the UK
seo.meta_description: Explore the Chapel Cliff Walk near Lansallos: a short, easy 2.6 km coastal hike with cliff-top views, practical safety tips, and packing suggestions for UK walkers.
